name: Fjallraven Greenland No. 1 Down Jacket - Men's
description: A warm, retro-style bomber made with contemporary ethical materials. Toss on the Fjallraven Greenland No. 1 Down Jacket for chilly weekends at the cabin or around town. The densely woven G-1000 Eco fabric is a blend of recycled polyester and organically grown cotton for premium durability, and it's treated with Fjallraven's Greenland Wax for improved resistance to rain or snow. 600-fill-power goose down keeps you warm during snowball fights or while building an outdoor hot tub. Rugged leather trim on the cuffs and hood add touches of time-tested durability and style.Made from Fjallraven's G-1000 Eco fabric, a super-durable blend of recycled polyester and organically grown cotton with a dense weave.Impregnated with Fjallraven's Greenland Wax treatment for excellent water resistance. To make it waterproof, apply additional wax (sold separately).Insulated with 600-fill-power goose down, certified as cruelty-free by Four Paws, an animal welfare organization.Lined with soft and lightweight Pertex Quantum recycled polyester that slides over layers.Leather trims around the hood and cuffs add durability and style.Handwarmer pockets, 2 chest pockets and a zippered interior pocket carry your stuff.Cuffs have snap adjustments for easy on/off.
